item.title: Shukto
item.description: Shukto is a classic Bengali mixed vegetable dish that is known for its unique blend of bitter, sweet, and savory flavors. Made with a variety of vegetables like bitter gourd, eggplant, potato, and drumsticks, and flavored with a mix of spices, this dish is a staple in many Bengali households. Shukto is not only delicious but also highly nutritious, making it a popular choice for those seeking healthy, vegetarian meal options.
